column4: My sound has just stopped working. Nothing anywhere. How do i get it working again?
check alsamixer
open a terminal and type alsamixer
ive got alsamixer open in terminal, now what am I looking for?
any of them muted? (MM)
I dont see anything that looks muted
can you post a screenshot?
I could if I knew how
http://imagebin.org/197501
wow, something is wrong there if thats all you got
and I didnt do anything to make it happen, it just up and quit working
did the sound used to work at some point?
yes, it worked for a long time, then about 2 weeks ago I upgraded to 11.04; but it did work for 2 weeks, until last night.
recently installed any ppas?
apps?
I dont think so. At least I do not remember doing so.
recently changed any hardware?
no. havent done anything in months
in that case i have no idea why the sound suddenly stopped working (i've never trusted doing upgrades though, i always fresh install)
yeah, i held off for a longt time becuase I had these problems last time I upgraded. Now what?
backup what you need and fresh install? up to you. or you can see if someone better than me can help (don't worry, i'm rather a novice so someone better shouldn't be hard to find)
okay, thanks for your help.
no worries :)
